name: Brainless Brackets!!
description:
Can't decide what movie to watch? What album to listen to? What book to read? Brainless Brackets is the ultimate tool for the comically indecisive: a tournament-style choice machine with weighted randomness!

Come up with a list of up to 64 options and have them battle it out in a series of 1v1 matches so you can finally decide how to spend your time!
